Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by blaming a "Muslim refugee" for the shooting, even though there is no evidence to support this.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that investigators do not believe the shooting was an act of Islamic terrorism.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence to back up the assertion that a "Muslim refugee" was responsible for the shooting.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the shooting was carried out by a "Muslim refugee" without any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the shooting was not carried out by a "Muslim refugee," but rather by two men who were charged in connection with the incident.
